title: #176: The Double Standard - #TheTeachersPet
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti discuss the Coroners' Inquests in 2001 held by Deputy State Coroner Jan Stevenson and the second coronial inquest which was held by Coroner Carl Milanovich in 2003 regarding Lyn Dawson's case. We dig into and compare and contrast Keli Lane's case and discuss the Director of Public Prosecution, Nicholas Cowdery's decision-making.

#HerNameWasLynDawson

#CoerciveControl

#TheTeachersPet


If you have any information about Lyn's disappearance and/or the historical sexual abuse allegations, please contact Crimestoppers on 1800 333 000



For more information about coercive control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/
